name: Eggplant
summary: Durian was born with his facial expressions opposite to everyone else.The film shows a time span of this little boy growing into a young adult, by displaying milestones in both his real life and his imaginary world.
info:
• 中文名: 茄子宣言
  • 上映年度: 2015
  • 片长: 7分40秒
  • 导演: Yangzi She
  • 编剧: Yangzi She
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
